AD5B.F.summary: Adevinta ASA operates as an online classifieds company worldwide. The company operates in four segments: France, Spain, Brazil, and Global Markets. It owns and operates 36 online classified marketplaces in generalist, real estate, cars, jobs, and other categories across a range of Websites and mobile applications in 16 countries. The company was formerly known as Marketplaces International ASA and changed its name to Adevinta ASA in February 2019. The company was founded in 2018 and is based in Oslo, Norway. Adevinta ASA operates as a subsidiary of Schibsted ASA.
